, I have something for you that I must deliver in person. Please find me in Highwatch when you read this letter.

- Braga

An invitation from your old friend Braga led you to the Velika Banquet. Music is playing, people are dancing, a play is in progress, fireworks are lighting up the sky, and everyone has a big smile on their face. It looks like Seir is about to make a speech.

It's been a long time, .
I received a message from the federation. Velika is planning a banquet, and they wanted me to deliver your invitation to you.
Halran will be there too. The banquet will be attended by numerous federation luminaries, as well as many of your old friends.

The invitation is enchanted to transport you to Velika. Just use the invitation when you're ready to go.

This is no time for a banquet!
The troops... we have to call back the troops that were sent to Elenea! Velika... no, the entire world is in great danger!

I have to speak to Seir... but these fools won't let me in without an invitation!

Please, will you deliver this letter to Seir?
The fate of the world lies in your hands!

Greetings, . May I see your invitation?

Ah! You're ! Welcome.

Seir was looking for you.

Please visit Valkyon Federation Headquarters before you enjoy the banquet."Is it possible to bring a guest?"

Is this about that guy?

Sorry, but no one is allowed into the banquet without an invitation... well, children being the exception.

I'm afraid your invitation is only valid for you.

Now please hurry. Seir is waiting for you.

, I've been waiting for you.

I'm always grateful for your service in the name of the Valkyon Federation.

Now by all means, go enjoy the banquet.

Elenea? Yes, we sent reinforcements. Why?

"I have a letter for you."

Verdas? I'm not familiar with that name...

The world is in great danger?

Sounds like yet another dire pronouncement from a disturbed individual.

I'll look into it after I finish my speech.

The banquet guide is waiting for you just outside the headquarters entrance.

Now please, relax and enjoy the festivities!

! Thank you for gracing this celebration with your presence.

We have prepared numerous events for the festivities: dancing, fine dining, a guessing game, a theatrical performance...and of course, Seir's speech.

Drop by again after you've attended all the events. I'm having a souvenir prepared for you.

You should start with the dance floor! I've been told you are an excellent dancer!

, you're quite the dancer! You must have worked up an appetite with all that dancing!

Why don't you drop by the catering area? I'm sure the chef has something special for you.

Welcome, !
What can we tempt you with today?

Please select a dish, and you can pick it up from the chef, right over there.

A fine choice! The Traditional Bleakfields BBQ is a dish that roasts a pigling wrapped in a palm leaf.

Our chef will have that ready for you in just a moment!
Ah, yes! The Freeholds Flame Salad! A delectable dish that mixes fresh vegetables with sky lotuses, tossed in a spicy dressing. I'm sure you'll enjoy it!
A bold choice! Bleak Wings consist of a stir-fried struthio breast, marinated in a special sauce, topped with a sky lotus. One bite, and you'll be a fan for life!
One Traditional Bleakfields BBQ ready! I hope you enjoy your meal.
One Freeholds Flame Salad ready! Please enjoy your meal.
One order of Bleak Wings ready! Enjoy your meal!

How was your meal, ?

Care to try your luck at the guessing game now? Just visit Carbest for an explanation of the rules, and the prizes.

Welcome, ! Here to try your luck? Excellent!

One of the four boxes in front of you—and only one—contains a lucky coin! You can only choose one box to open!

Are you feeling lucky? I'm ready when you are!

It seems it's your lucky day, !

You've sampled all the festivities, then? You should return to Meren, and collect your souvenir.

Oh, and it's almost time for Seir's speech. Why in the name of Velik would they schedule the show for right after the speech?

I'm guessing they didn't want everyone drifting away after the play, and not staying to hear what Seir has to say...
Wait! You forgot your lucky coin! Better get it before someone else grabs it.

Have you been enjoying the festivities, ?

You've visited all the events? Excellent!
Here's the souvenir I promised you. I hope you like it.

Seir should be delivering his speech any minute now. You should have a quick word with him before he goes on.
And remember, there's a play scheduled for right after Seir's speech.
